China's exports seen improving in December as global trade picks upChina's exports likely grew more quickly and for a second month in December, a Reuters poll showed, adding to signs global trade is starting to recover thanks to an upturn in the electronics industry and expectations of lower borrowing costs in 2024. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 05:13:21 GMT DFLDJLBE5BKQBKD4QLTVUFZLV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-exports-seen-improving-december-global-trade-picks-up-2024-01-10/Joe Cash世界中国
Indonesia, Philippines discuss South China Sea developments - MarcosThe leaders of the Philippines and Indonesia met on Wednesday to discuss a range of regional issues including developments in the South China Sea and closer cooperation among member states of the Southeast Asian bloc. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 03:59:31 GMT 7Q33CV3W3JPAXCVDLE7LA633UU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-philippines-discuss-south-china-sea-developments-marcos-2024-01-10/Reuters世界亚太地区
Liberal PDP wins parliamentary elections in Bhutan - provisional vote tallyA liberal political party led by a former prime minister was set to form a new government in Bhutan after winning its fourth free vote since democratic elections began 15 years ago, provisional results by the country's election body showed on Wednesday. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 03:49:29 GMT L64L65NUL5KNHBCBBLTVHMVDDU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/liberal-pdp-wins-parliamentary-elections-bhutan-provisional-vote-tally-2024-01-10/Gopal Sharma世界亚太地区
Profiles of Taiwan's presidential candidatesTaiwan votes in presidential and parliamentary elections on Saturday, with three candidates standing for the position of president. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 03:35:38 GMT ZXSZU7XS5ZJILBV3Q5UM5QPSQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/profiles-taiwans-presidential-candidates-2024-01-10/Reuters世界亚太地区
Key facts on Taiwan-China relations ahead of Taiwan electionsTaiwan goes to the polls on Saturday to elect a new president and parliament. China, which considers Taiwan merely a Chinese province and part of its territory despite the objections of the island's government, will be watching the outcome closely. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 03:29:28 GMT FMM3BTDPUFOVJCPWOKYM3R4YPQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/key-facts-taiwan-china-relations-ahead-taiwan-elections-2024-01-10/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taiwan to vote in what China calls 'peace and war' electionTaiwan goes to the polls on Saturday to elect a new president and parliament under the shadow of an increasingly assertive China which has called the vote a choice between peace and war. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 03:05:20 GMT UDMYZVFHLZI4RPTZA2DOS4VUJA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-vote-what-c​​hina-calls-peace-war-election-2024-01-10/Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard世界亚太地区
Taiwan's de facto ambassador to US meets US House speakerTaiwan's de facto ambassador to the United States met on Tuesday with U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Mike Johnson, Taiwan's foreign ministry said on Wednesday. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 02:53:33 GMT AD5I6FTNQVPQVFKEUEGPIBHXTA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwans-de-facto-ambassador-us-meets-us-house-speaker-2024-01-10/Reuters世界亚太地区
Nikkei rides high while traders wait on US inflationJapanese stocks hit a near 34-year high on Wednesday while other Asian equities meandered close to one-month lows and bond markets traded cautiously ahead of U.S. inflation data due this week. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 02:15:52 GMT DDW7W7L57NIZRNZLWNNIA4CJAE https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-01-10/Tom Westbrook市场
Dollar steady as traders brace for US inflation data, bitcoin volatileThe dollar was steady on Wednesday in cautious trading ahead of U.S. inflation data due later this week that is likely to influence the Federal Reserve's policy, while bitcoin was volatile after a fake social media post rattled markets. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 02:02:06 GMT Y4LADQIHINMIPMFNHSQF4IUP3Q https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-steady-traders-brace-us-inflation-data-bitcoin-volatile-2024-01-10/Ankur Banerjee市场货币
US, China conclude two days of military talks in WashingtonThe United States and China wrapped up two days of military talks in Washington on Tuesday, the Pentagon said, the latest engagement since the two countries agreed to resume military-to-military ties. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 23:41:19 GMT 67GFOAY4HFPUFFDDDJUNQPXWJZY https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-china-conclude-two-days-military-talks-washington-2024-01-09/Reuters世界美国
China satellite launch causes pre-election political storm in TaiwanThe launch of a Chinese satellite that flew over Taiwan, prompting an erroneous air raid alert, sparked a political storm on the island on Wednesday about China's motives only days out from presidential elections. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 23:25:16 GMT KFGIBKB2QBOZ3MLJ7NHPYKWOCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-does-not-consider-china-satellite-launch-election-interference-2024-01-09/Yimou Lee, Sarah Wu世界亚太地区
